title: Efficient synthesis of amides from secondary alcohols and CH3CN promoted by Fe(NO3)3·9H2O
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29588-29594
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04146A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Han Li, Xiaodan Wang, Wenhao Li, Xinmei Wang, Ruijing Cheng, Danfeng He, Huanjun Xu, Yiying Li, Jinhui Wang
An efficient, green and convenient protocol for synthesizing amides from secondary alcohols using Fe(NO3)3·9H2O as the mediator, with CH3CN as the N-source and solvent. This approach was scalable to the gram level.
